Package com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory

Interface Summary
ConnectionProducer The interface specifying the API for the producers of a connections to a specific databases.
DBConnectionFactory An interface defining the factory API that enables the clients to obtain the connections with a specific database.
 

Class Summary
DBConnectionFactoryHelper This is the helper class added in version 1.1.
DBConnectionFactoryImpl A default implementation of DBConnectionFactory interface.
 

Exception Summary
ConfigurationException An exception to be thrown by DBConnectionFactoryImpl being initialized from a parameters provided by a configuration namespace if any error occurs while reading the configuration parameters, instantiating and initializing the ConnectionProducers.
DBConnectionException An exception to be thrown by DBConnectionFactory methods if a requested connection can not be created for some reason.
NoDefaultConnectionException An exception to be thrown by DBConnectionFactory.createConnection() and DBConnectionFactory.createConnection(String, String) methods if the default connection is not configured within the factory.
UnknownConnectionException An exception to be thrown by:
(1)DBConnectionFactory.createConnection(String) and DBConnectionFactoryImpl.createConnection(String, String, String) methods if the connection corresponding to specified name is not configured within the factory.
